record.title: LANE EVANS POST OFFICE BUILDING
record.chair: The pending business is the question of suspending the rules and passing the bill, H.R. 521.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the bill.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentlewoman from the District of Columbia (Ms. Norton) that the House suspend the rules and pass the bill, H.R. 521, on which the yeas and nays are ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 58 I was unable to vote due to weather and traffic delays. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
